title: Awesome List Updates on Feb 10, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Feb 10, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Storage / Databases

*   [micropg\_lite (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/TimonW-Dev/micropg_lite) - Lightweight version of micropg with some slight limitations (e.g. error handling), in order to run on low-RAM microcontrollers (works with ESP8266).
*   [micropg\_superlite (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/TimonW-Dev/micropg_superlite) - The lightest PostgreSQL database driver for micropython based on micropg\_lite/micropg, but has even stronger restrictions in functionality and focuses only on the absolutely necessary functions.
items.content_html:
Storage / Databases

  • micropg_lite (‚≠ê5) - Lightweight version of micropg with some slight limitations (e.g. error handling), in order to run on low-RAM microcontrollers (works with ESP8266).
  • micropg_superlite (‚≠ê0) - The lightest PostgreSQL database driver for micropython based on micropg_lite/micropg, but has even stronger restrictions in functionality and focuses only on the absolutely necessary functions.

items.title: Awesome Graphql
items.content_text:
### PHP / React

*   [jerowork/graphql-schema-builder (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/jerowork/graphql-attribute-schema) - Easily build your GraphQL schema for webonyx/graphql-php using PHP attributes instead of large configuration arrays.
items.content_html:
PHP / React

  • jerowork/graphql-schema-builder (‚≠ê16) - Easily build your GraphQL schema for webonyx/graphql-php using PHP attributes instead of large configuration arrays.

items.title: Awesome Gnome
items.content_text:
### Multimedia

*   [Drum Machine](https://apps.gnome.org/DrumMachine/) - Create and play drum beats. ![GNOME Circle](https://cdn.rawgit.com/kazhnuz/awesome-gnome/master/images/gnome-circle.png)
items.content_html:
Multimedia

  • Drum Machine - Create and play drum beats.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Stream Processing

*   [go-etl (‚≠ê149)](https://github.com/Breeze0806/go-etl) - A lightweight toolkit for data source extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL).
items.content_html:
Stream Processing

  • go-etl (‚≠ê149) - A lightweight toolkit for data source extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL).

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Productivity

*   [Raycast](https://raycast.com?via=ae02) - Raycast lets you control your tools and apps with shortcuts, download extensions from the store, and use AI models like ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Gemini, Claude, etc. You can also create snippets and use Raycast Notes to maximize your productivity.
items.content_html:
Utilities / Productivity

  • Raycast - Raycast lets you control your tools and apps with shortcuts, download extensions from the store, and use AI models like ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Gemini, Claude, etc. You can also create snippets and use Raycast Notes to maximize your productivity.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### File Explorer / Diagnostics

*   [mikavilpas/yazi.nvim (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/mikavilpas/yazi.nvim) - Integration with the Yazi terminal file manager.

### Git / Diagnostics

Git / Diagnostics

items.title: Awesome Terraform
items.content_text:
### Providers / Community providers

*   [terraform-provider-minio (‚≠ê287)](https://github.com/aminueza/terraform-provider-minio) - Terraform provider for managing MinIO S3 buckets and IAM Users.
*   [terraform-provider-proxmox (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/Telmate/terraform-provider-proxmox) - Terraform Proxmox provider.
*   [terraform-provider-value (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/pseudo-dynamic/terraform-provider-value) - Value Provider for Terraform.

### Testing / Community providers

*   [clarity (‚≠ê141)](https://github.com/xchapter7x/clarity) - A declarative test framework for Terraform for unit testing. :skull:
*   [kitchen-terraform (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/newcontext-oss/kitchen-terraform) - Provides a set of Test Kitchen plugins which enable a system to use Test Kitchen to converge a Terraform configuration and verify the resulting Terraform state with InSpec controls. :skull:
*   [rspec-terraform (‚≠ê92)](https://github.com/bsnape/rspec-terraform) - RSpec tests for your Terraform modules. :skull:

### Tools / Community providers

*   [hcl2json (‚≠ê441)](https://github.com/tmccombs/hcl2json) - Convert hcl2 to json.
*   [hcledit (‚≠ê60)](https://github.com/mercari/hcledit) - Go package to edit HCL configuration
*   [hq (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/miller-time/hq) - command-line HCL processor
*   [tfk8s (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/jrhouston/tfk8s) - A tool for converting Kubernetes YAML manifests to Terraform HCL
*   [threatcl (‚≠ê432)](https://github.com/threatcl/threatcl) - Documenting your Threat Models with HCL
*   [yj (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/sclevine/yj) - CLI - Convert between YAML, TOML, JSON, and HCL. Preserves map order.

### Libraries / IDE

*   [hcl-rs (‚≠ê155)](https://github.com/martinohmann/hcl-rs) - HCL parsing and encoding libraries for rust with serde support
*   [hcl4j (‚≠ê71)](https://github.com/bertramdev/hcl4j) - HCL parser in Java
*   [tree-sitter-hcl (‚≠ê114)](https://github.com/tree-sitter-grammars/tree-sitter-hcl) - HCL grammar for tree-sitter

### Editor Plugins / IDE

*   [vim-hcl (‚≠ê140)](https://github.com/jvirtanen/vim-hcl) - Syntax highlighting for HCL
*   [Vim-Terraform (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/hashivim/vim-terraform)
items.content_html:
Providers / Community providers

  • terraform-provider-minio (‚≠ê287) - Terraform provider for managing MinIO S3 buckets and IAM Users.
  • terraform-provider-proxmox (‚≠ê2.5k) - Terraform Proxmox provider.
  • terraform-provider-value (‚≠ê16) - Value Provider for Terraform.

Testing / Community providers

  • clarity (‚≠ê141) - A declarative test framework for Terraform for unit testing. üíÄ
  • kitchen-terraform (‚≠ê1.1k) - Provides a set of Test Kitchen plugins which enable a system to use Test Kitchen to converge a Terraform configuration and verify the resulting Terraform state with InSpec controls. üíÄ
  • rspec-terraform (‚≠ê92) - RSpec tests for your Terraform modules. üíÄ

Tools / Community providers

  • hcl2json (‚≠ê441) - Convert hcl2 to json.
  • hcledit (‚≠ê60) - Go package to edit HCL configuration
  • hq (‚≠ê5) - command-line HCL processor
  • tfk8s (‚≠ê1k) - A tool for converting Kubernetes YAML manifests to Terraform HCL
  • threatcl (‚≠ê432) - Documenting your Threat Models with HCL
  • yj (‚≠ê1k) - CLI - Convert between YAML, TOML, JSON, and HCL. Preserves map order.

Libraries / IDE

  • hcl-rs (‚≠ê155) - HCL parsing and encoding libraries for rust with serde support
  • hcl4j (‚≠ê71) - HCL parser in Java
  • tree-sitter-hcl (‚≠ê114) - HCL grammar for tree-sitter

Editor Plugins / IDE

  • vim-hcl (‚≠ê140) - Syntax highlighting for HCL
  • Vim-Terraform (‚≠ê1.1k)
